metadata.description: Skills for using the Exa.ai API efficiently

plugins.name: exa-core
plugins.description: Use exa-ai core search commands with token-efficient strategies. Covers search, find-similar, answer, context, get-contents commands and structured data extraction.

plugins.name: exa-research
plugins.description: Manage async research tasks with exa-ai for complex research workflows

plugins.name: exa-websets
plugins.description: Manage websets, collections, enrichments, imports, and monitors in exa-ai
